name: Pop It (GameDevMatt)
description:
Thank you for taking some time to look at my game!

This was made for the Tiny Mini Game DragonRuby Jam

it was made in about 6-8 hours of total time, I used some Art from some Asset Packs from here on Itch.io i will update the name of the packs later. 

here is the simple story of the Ninja who want to improve his skills, So he sets a timer of 20 Secs and tries to hit the balloon as many times as he is able. 

push space button to start the arrow moving, and release the space button to launch the arrow! 

good luck!
